nodes.html: • Are rapid antigen at-home tests, not PCR

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Can be taken at home or other locations. Give results within 30 minutes (no lab drop-off required)

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Can be used for testing whether you have COVID-⁠19 symptoms or not

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Can be used for testing whether you are up to date on your COVID-⁠19 vaccines or not.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Are also referred to as self-⁠tests or over the counter (OTC) tests

nodes.html: • If you begin having COVID-⁠19 symptoms like fever, sore throat, runny nose, or loss of taste or smell, or

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • At least 5 days after you come into close contact with someone with COVID-⁠19, or

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • When you’re going to gather with a group of people, especially those who are at risk of severe disease or may not be up to date on their COVID-⁠19 vaccines
